posts.post_content: Thanks to the help of a board member I got a T206 Wilson... Now I'm looking for a raw Owen Wilson T207 card, any back. Must be a least G/VG or higher. Will also take graded PSA/SGC 2/30.. Thanks in advance. Ralph
Mike card was a beauty with the Broadleaf back, Price is excellent but little steeper than I was looking to spend on the card. The search goes on... Thanks guys
